sentence.Network_en: We aimed the microscope at a likely looking target.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们把显微镜对准了一个看起来合适的目标。

sentence.Network_en: Game wardens were appointed to enforce hunting laws in New Hampshire.
sentence.Network_cn: 狩猎监督官被派到新罕布什尔州去执行狩猎法令。

sentence.Network_en: I struck the ball cleanly and my shot was on target.
sentence.Network_cn: 我干脆利落地击球，命中了目标。

auth_sentence.content: Theirs is a moving target, ours is still.
auth_sentence.res_content: Theirs is a moving target, ours is still.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Theirs is a moving target, ours is still.

auth_sentence.content: Cavendish's big target this year was Olympic gold.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cavendish's big target this year was Olympic gold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cavendish's big target this year was Olympic gold.

auth_sentence.content: Smiladon and Tyranasaurus were both hunting the Wholly Mammoth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Smiladon and Tyranasaurus were both hunting the Wholly Mammoth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Smiladon and Tyranasaurus were both hunting the Wholly Mammoth.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自百度翻译。
